slices.name: Upcoming School
slices.desc: School is coming up, and I am stressed about having to deal with the day-to-day stuff, keeping up with classes and being around a lot of people and whatnot.

slices.name: Therapy
slices.desc: Setting up a therapist has been extremely long and more complicated that it needed to be, I am stressed about having to actually set it up, as well as to make it to therapy every session.

slices.name: Social Life
slices.desc: It is necessary for me to rebuild my social life, find people I can hang out with and learn from in person so that I'm not stuck in my room all the time. I don't have to like them that much, just enjoy them enough to want to get out of the house to do stuff with them. Clubs (mainly CSC clubs) seem like a good outlet, but still a daunting task.

slices.name: Spending Habit
slices.desc: I have a bad habit of spending money and buying things I really don't need. It inhibits me from saving my money for more important things.

slices.name: Cleaning my room
slices.desc: Despite being a small menial task, the messiness of my room, and the overwhelming feeling whenever I want to try and clean it up somewhat, adds to my stress for sure.

slices.name: College Money
slices.desc: Self descriptive, shit ton of money, I want to get into a job that I can actually make serious money at.

slices.name: Adulthood
slices.desc: Becoming an adult is right around the corner, and it is terrifying, I don't think I have to explain this one.

slices.name: Dad
slices.desc: Pressuring me to work and work on myself, to do a lot and achieve a lot of things. Done out of love I'm sure, but not very helpful for the problems I'm really dealing with. I want to be able to open up, to tell him how things are really going so that he can understand better.

slices.name: Mom
slices.desc: I want to understand my mother and get closer with her, being close with my family, especially my parents is a big concern as I start to become an adult and need their help and assurance more than ever.

slices.name: Olivia
slices.desc: A great sister, and is definitely who I'm closest to in the whole family, but plays a better daughter than I am a son. She's a good sister again, I just wish I were better.

slices.name: Robyn
slices.desc: Tries to be a good sibling, ends up making me feel very self concious and bad about myself through them pointing out stuff about my physical appearance and the way I act.

slices.name: Grandparents
slices.desc: I'm not sure if my grandparents would approve of who I am as a person (very liberal, gay, etc.) but I want to get closer with them while I still have them. A dark thought, but being immersed into media like \"Everwhere at the end of time\" has made me uncannily aware of how soon it could be before I lose my grandparents.

slices.name: Dad - Job
slices.desc: My dad has been constantly badgering me about getting a job, something I don't think I have the mental ability to handle right now. It sucks because I don't know how to explain to him that I can't handle one. But his constant pressure to get one is extremely stressful and one of my biggest stressors at the moment.

slices.name: Expectations
slices.desc: I feel like I am expected to do 'great things' and be successful. Again, a lot of that comes from my dad, but it's a lot of pressure to be expected to do even just moderately well in life.

slices.name: Past friendships
slices.desc: I feel a sense of guilt about having almost left my entire previous social life. But there are a few loose ends I need to take care of. Mainly that I have some birthday presents I need to give to Lake that I preordered long before my hiatus.

slices.name: Video Essays
slices.desc: I always want to create video essays to share the information and skills I learn with other people. To make videos that I would have been absolutely dumbfounded if I were to watch them years ago.

slices.name: Goblin game
slices.desc: Kind of my main focus. Attempting to fix the same collision issue I've had for ages. A huge undertaking, honestly, yet something that I'm very passionate and excited about. Not super stressing, just something I wish I could be better at and do more with.

slices.name: CSC Intern
slices.desc: I do not want to work, but when I do, I want to join a Computer Science-related (Software Engineering?) internship, seeing as I probably wouldn't get a proper job in the field of computer science until after I've gotten a degree of some kind

slices.name: Making friends
slices.desc: I'd say it's pretty self explanitory for me to want to make genuine friends.
